response.explain: The error message indicates that the robot is not within two meters of the sink, which is required for the robot to put the chopping board inside the sink. This suggests that the robot has not successfully moved to the sink in the previous steps.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the breakfast table where the chopping board is located.
(2) Grasp the chopping board.
(3) Move the robot to the sink.
(4) Put the chopping board on the sink.
(5) Move the robot to the sink again.
(6) Put the chopping board in the sink.
